short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modern metal planters, and other unique site furnishings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yard Art is a distributor of custom fabricated metal landscape elements, and different offerings of other contemporary site furnishings, inlcuding planters, fountains, water features, and benches. There are modern fountain and planter designs cast from GFRC and Cast Stone, and a Swiss made line of Fiber Cement planters and landscape elements. There is also a line of modern furniture, made primarily from Teak, Stainless Steel and Aluminum. If you have a landscape project that utilizes the above materials, we can help you find a cataloged item, or take your design and have it built to specification. We are located in Danville, California, which is about 30 miles east of San Francisco.
